description: This source file defines the EditNoteActivity class, which provides an Android activity for creating and editing notes within a note-taking app. It manages user input fields, handles saving and deleting notes via a NotesRepository, and manages activity transitions.

classes.name: EditNoteActivity
classes.description: Android activity for editing or creating notes, handling UI input, note data persistence via repository, and activity transition effects.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, loads existing note if present, and sets click listeners for save and delete actions.

methods.name: populate
methods.description: Populates the input fields with data from a given Note object.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Collects data from input fields and saves or updates the note via the repository.

methods.name: finishWithTransition
methods.description: Finishes the activity with a transition animation.
